itinerary.mapNote: Crosses Red Crater 1886m, Emerald Lakes, Blue Lake. 1340m.
Desert Road side. Oldest hut on circuit. 1120m.
Circuit complete. Village with ski lodges. 1130m.

waypoints.name: Red Crater
waypoints.note: Active volcanic crater. Highest point on the crossing.

waypoints.name: Emerald Lakes
waypoints.note: Vivid acid-mineral lakes in old explosion craters.

waypoints.name: Blue Lake (Te Wai Whakaata o te Rangihiroa)
waypoints.note: Sacred Māori lake. Deepest blue. Do not touch the water.

waypoints.name: Mount Ngauruhoe
waypoints.note: 'Mount Doom' from Lord of the Rings. Can be climbed from South Crater.

waypoints.name: Mount Ruapehu
waypoints.note: Highest peak on North Island. Active volcano with crater lake.

waypoints.name: South Crater
waypoints.note: Flat plateau between Mangatepopo Valley and Red Crater.
